casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Bobby Ray GRADY No. 249P11-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Mr. Bobby Grady, Mr. Mark Montgomery, Attorneys at Law, for Grady, Bobby R. Mr. K. D. Sturgis, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 14th of February 2018 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wayne County:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
